[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@boba-cli/dsl](./dsl.md) &gt; [MessageContext](./dsl.messagecontext.md)

## MessageContext interface

Context passed to message handlers.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface MessageContext<State, Components extends Record<string, unknown>, M extends Msg> 
```

## Remarks

Similar to [EventContext](./dsl.eventcontext.md) but also includes the received message.
